alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Latah and southeastern Whitman Counties through 230 PM PDT... At 144 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Pullman, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pullman, Moscow, Colton, and Uniontown. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 332 and 349. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 5 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
